Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: Until Dawn plays like you'd expect from an interactive game that boast 'huge' decisions in it's story. It's stiff\, with a bunch of quick time events and mediocre characters. Somehow though\, Until Dawn gives just enough camp and an interesting enough plot that actually tailors to your choices to make it worth a playthrough or two. It's also one of the best looking games on the Playstation 4.
